1.title: Should teachers get tenure?
1.PRO: Pros: Protects academic freedom; Encourages quality teaching; Promotes job security.
1.CON: Cons: Limits teacher mobility; Can be abused; Can lead to poor teaching.

2.title: Is vaping with e-cigarettes safe?
2.PRO: Pros: Helps quit smoking; Safer; Reduce health care costs; Create jobs
2.CON: Cons: Addiction to nicotine; Introducing to smoking; Causes health risks, depression, lung disease; Explosion.

3.title: Should insider trading be allowed?
3.PRO: Pros: Allows for more efficient markets; Provides incentives for company insiders to improve performance; Higher stock prices
3.CON: Cons: Market manipulation; Unfairness; Loss of public trust; Too big to fail

4.title: Should corporal punishment be used in schools?
4.PRO: Pros: Discipline children; Teaches respect; Maintains order in classrooms
4.CON: Cons: Can be excessive; Physical and emotional damage; Creates bullies; Non-effective in the long run.

6.title: Is a college education worth it?

7.title: Should felons who have completed their sentence be allowed to vote?

8.title: Should abortion be legal?
8.PRO: Yes, because: Abortion is a fundamental right; Safe; Empowers and protects women; Reduces injury and death.
8.CON: No, because: Abortion is murder; Psychological damage; Discrimination; Irresponsible; Causes medical problems.
